feed.title: St. Peters Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:41 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 10:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries changing to flurries this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:19 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 09:19 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 09:19 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
